backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, manga entry CRUD operations with pagination, genre management, and access control using mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features related to fixing black screen issues after page refresh, verifying OKLCH color system rendering, and checking service worker cache behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including components with explicit bg-background/text-foreground classes, authentication flows, manga management UI, React Query hooks with backend readiness gating, and OKLCH/rgb color system configuration.
frontend/docs/PREDEPLOY_LAYOUT_VERIFICAT: Pre-deployment checklist for verifying layout integrity across AppLayout (collapsible header/footer), MangaListPage (row alignment and sizing), and AddMangaDialog (fixed header with scrollable body) on mobile/tablet/desktop viewports.
frontend/docs/REBASELINE_FROM_LIVE.md: Documentation of rebaseline process performed on February 6, 2026 to align codebase with live deployment, removing layout corruption from draft versions 44-45 and establishing verification rules.
frontend/index.css: Empty CSS file (content truncated or not provided).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with inline styles setting background to rgb(252, 250, 245) and text color to rgb(38, 36, 33) for minimum 100vh height, loading main.tsx module.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets, network-first for API calls and CSS files, with versioned cache management (v2), old cache cleanup on activation, and message handler for cache clearing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component that handles authentication flow, service worker registration, and conditionally renders login prompt, profile setup dialog, or manga list page based on user state.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginLogout: Button component that toggles between login and logout states, clearing all caches (React Query, IndexedDB, service worker) on logout and handling authentication errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name for profile creation, with no close button to force completion.
frontend/src/components/layout/APP_LAYOU: Test checklist document for verifying AppLayout component behavior including header collapse/expand, sticky positioning, footer placement, and responsive design across viewports.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper with collapsible sticky header (logo, title, login button), main content area, and footer with attribution link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/manga/ADD_MANGA_: Test checklist for verifying Add Manga dialog scrollability, viewport constraints (90vh/90dvh), fixed header, 400px max-height body scroll area, and accessibility across mobile, tablet, and laptop screens.
frontend/src/components/manga/AddMangaDi: Dialog form for adding new manga entries with fields for title, alternate titles, genres (with custom genre creation), cover images, synopsis, chapters, status, and rating; includes auto-pruning of invalid genres.
frontend/src/components/manga/AutoScroll: Component that automatically scrolls long titles vertically using CSS animation, pausing on hover and detecting overflow to conditionally enable scrolling.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverHover: A draggable popup component that displays manga cover image, title cycling, and synopsis on hover. Supports persistent positioning, click-outside-to-close, and uses cached cover images.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverImage: Form field component for uploading and managing manga cover images with file upload, progress tracking, and image removal functionality.
frontend/src/components/manga/EditMangaD: Dialog component for editing manga entries with fields for title, genres, cover images, synopsis, and chapter counts. Computes delta updates and handles custom genre creation.
frontend/src/components/manga/EditNotesD: Simple dialog component for editing manga notes with a textarea, save/cancel actions, and backend connection status handling.
frontend/src/components/manga/FloatingCo: Collapsible sticky panel that wraps MangaListControls, providing expand/collapse functionality for filters and search controls.
frontend/src/components/manga/GenreCheck: Displays genres in a 3-column grid with checkboxes, dynamically measuring and aligning row widths for consistent layout.
frontend/src/components/manga/MANGA_LIST: Comprehensive checklist document for verifying MangaListPage layout integrity including row alignment, overflow behavior, loading states, and responsive design across viewports.
Displays a manga entry card with cover image, title cycling, rating, bookmark, notes, and chapter progress controls. Handles user interactions for updating manga metadata via mutations and includes hover popups for cover and notes preview.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListC: Provides filtering and sorting controls for the manga list including title/synopsis/notes search, genre filter popover, bookmark/completed toggles, sort options, and watchlist alignment buttons. Includes an 'Add Manga' button.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListP: Main page component that orchestrates manga list display with pagination, filtering, sorting, and connection status handling. Manages state for search filters, genre selection, and displays loading/error states with offline mode support.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaRowAc: Wraps a MangaCard with edit and delete action buttons. Manages edit dialog and delete confirmation alert dialog states, handling manga deletion via mutation.
frontend/src/components/manga/NotesPrevi: Renders a fixed overlay portal displaying manga notes text in a styled amber box when visible. Used for previewing notes on hover.
frontend/src/components/manga/Pagination: Provides pagination UI with previous/next buttons, numbered page buttons with ellipsis for large page counts, and a jump-to-page input field. Handles page clamping and navigation.
frontend/src/context/BackendConnectionCo: Creates a React context provider for singleton backend connection state using useBackendConnection hook. Exports a context hook that throws if used outside the provider to ensure proper setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, initializing access control with an admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Provides an extended actor interface with connection state tracking and retry functionality by delegating to the singleton backend connection hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllMangaEntries.ts: Fetches all manga entries from the backend with authentication, caching results in both localStorage and IndexedDB, and falling back to cached data on errors.
Manages backend actor initialization and readiness with hard timeouts, bounded retry logic, session generation for race condition prevention, and comprehensive diagnostic tracking including automatic timeout safeguards.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendConnectionS: Provides access to the singleton backend connection state from the BackendConnectionContext to ensure only one connection attempt loop is active.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Exposes backend readiness state by delegating to the singleton connection hook and mapping connection status to readiness status.
frontend/src/hooks/useCachedCoverImageUr: Returns a cover image URL preferring cached blob from IndexedDB when available, falling back to network URL while asynchronously fetching and caching in the background.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides queries and mutations for fetching and saving the current authenticated user's profile, with proper connection dependency handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication with AuthClient, providing login/logout functionality, identity state management, and a React context provider for authentication status.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibraryGenres.ts: Extracts and returns a sorted list of unique genres from all manga entries in the library.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaMutations.ts: Provides mutations for adding, updating, rating, bookmarking, and managing notes for manga entries with query invalidation and error classification.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaPage.ts: Hook file for manga pagination functionality (content truncated).
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistentPopupPos: React hook that manages draggable popup positioning with localStorage persistence, automatic centering on first use, viewport clamping, and window resize handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useUniformWatchlistRo: React hook that calculates and maintains uniform width across watchlist rows by measuring registered elements, observing resizes, and handling image load events.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm sepia/ink color palette using CSS variables, OKLCH color support, dark mode variants, and gold accent utilities for watchlist theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/sw/registerServiceWorker.ts: Service worker registration utilities with update detection and cache clearing functionality via postMessage communication.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrorClassific: Error classification utility that categorizes backend errors (connecting, transient, authorization, timeout, application) and determines retry behavior, with special handling for superseded requests.
frontend/src/utils/backendNotReadyMessag: Provides unified backend-not-ready error message constant and assertion helper for consistent error handling across the application.
frontend/src/utils/formatChapterNumber.t: Utility function that formats chapter numbers as integers when whole or with decimals when fractional.
frontend/src/utils/indexedDb.ts: Generic IndexedDB wrapper providing async operations (get, put, delete, getAllKeys) for mangaMetadata and coverImages object stores.
frontend/src/utils/offlineCoverImageInde: Cover image caching layer using IndexedDB to store blobs keyed by principal, stableId, and URL hash, with fetch-and-cache and principal-specific clearing utilities.
frontend/src/utils/offlineMangaCache.ts: Legacy localStorage-based cache for manga entries with serialization/deserialization functions that convert MangaEntry objects to/from JSON-compatible format including BigInt handling.
frontend/src/utils/offlineMangaIndexedDb: IndexedDB-backed manga metadata cache with per-principal namespacing, providing async read/write/clear operations for serialized manga entries with version control.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Utility functions to wrap promises with hard timeouts, including a TimeoutError class and helpers for creating timeout promises that reject after specified durations.
frontend/src/utils/retryBackoff.ts: Bounded exponential backoff retry logic with jitter, configurable max retries, delays, total time limits, and per-operation timeouts, plus a RetryManager class for manual control.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter parsing utilities supporting both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and functions to extract, store, and clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH-based color system using CSS custom properties (rgb(var(--color))), custom animations, typography, and container query plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking a black screen bug after page refresh, with features investigating OKLCH color system rendering, service worker cache behavior, and UI visibility issues.
